description: SQL analytics and data engineering for AI Assistants and IDEs

lifecycle.reason: Missing required package metadata (runtimeHint or identifier)

name: io.github.motherduckdb/mcp-server-motherduck

environmentVariables.description: Access token for MotherDuck connections (alternative to --motherduck-token)
environmentVariables.name: motherduck_token

environmentVariables.description: Access token for MotherDuck connections (alternative to --motherduck-token)
environmentVariables.name: MOTHERDUCK_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Used by DuckDB for extensions and config. Override with --home-dir if not set.
environmentVariables.name: HOME

environmentVariables.description: AWS access key for S3 database connections
environmentVariables.name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID

environmentVariables.description: AWS secret access key for S3 database connections
environmentVariables.name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY

environmentVariables.description: AWS session token for temporary credentials
environmentVariables.name: AWS_SESSION_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: AWS region for S3 database connections
environmentVariables.name: AWS_DEFAULT_REGION

packageArguments.description: Transport type for MCP server. Use 'http' for HTTP Streamable transport.
packageArguments.name: --transport

packageArguments.description: Port to listen on for HTTP transport
packageArguments.name: --port

packageArguments.description: Host to bind the MCP server
packageArguments.name: --host

packageArguments.description: Database path: ':memory:' for in-memory, 'md:' for MotherDuck, or file/S3 path
packageArguments.name: --db-path

packageArguments.description: Enable write access (server runs in read-only mode by default)
packageArguments.name: --read-write

packageArguments.description: Enable the switch_database_connection tool to change databases at runtime
packageArguments.name: --allow-switch-databases

packageArguments.description: Enable SaaS mode for MotherDuck (disables local filesystem access)
packageArguments.name: --motherduck-saas-mode

packageArguments.description: SQL file path or SQL string to execute on startup
packageArguments.name: --init-sql

packageArguments.description: Maximum number of rows to return from queries
packageArguments.name: --max-rows

packageArguments.description: Maximum number of characters in query results
packageArguments.name: --max-chars

packageArguments.description: Query execution timeout in seconds (-1 to disable)
packageArguments.name: --query-timeout

packageArguments.description: Use temporary connections for read-only local DuckDB files (default: true)
packageArguments.name: --ephemeral-connections
